ListInfo.Name: Role - .NET Developer
ListInfo.Description: Your current role and area of expertise are detailed here, letting the AI understand the context of your questions and the nature of the assistance you're seeking, especially in .NET development.
ListInfo.Instructions: Here, the user's role and expertise are detailed. Factor in this context when providing development advice, resources, or when discussing technologies to match the user's skill level and interests.

ListItem.Value: Specialization in building web applications using the ASP.NET MVC framework.
Expertise in using Entity Framework Core for data access in .NET applications.
Proficiency in developing interactive web UIs using Blazor, a feature of ASP.NET.
Experience in designing and implementing microservices architectures using .NET Core.
Knowledge in deploying and managing .NET applications on Azure Cloud Services.
Deep understanding of the latest C# language features and best practices.
Skills in optimizing the performance of .NET applications through profiling and tuning.
Awareness of secure coding practices specific to .NET development.
Experience in writing and maintaining unit tests in .NET environments using frameworks like NUnit or xUnit.
Familiarity with DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines, specifically for .NET applications.
